title: The Best-est Party Looks of the Week
text:
Photo: Getty Images

Out with September and in with the holiday season (and by that, we mean Halloween). Party-goers celebrated the Emmy’s this week with sequins, sparkles, and floor-length gowns (a la Gwyneth Paltrow’s viral walk). Tan France swapped his go-to French tuck for an elegant cummerbund at the Netflix Emmy Awards after party. Natasha Lyonne showed she’s not afraid of color in a purple dress with silver accents. And Billy Fong proved Hunter boots work for any occasion. Who wore the best look? Scroll to see everyone below.

The Outfit I Wish My Date Wore to Prom: Tan France

Photo: Tommaso Boddi/Getty Images for The Hollywood R

At Netflix’s 71st Emmy Awards After Party.

Best Brocade Ballgown: Laverne Cox

Photo: Jared Siskin/Patrick McMullan via Getty Image

At the Metropolitan Opera Opening Night Gala.

Most Likely to Join The Fantanas: Natasha Lyonne

Photo: KEVORK DJANSEZIAN/Getty Images for BAFTA LA

At the BAFTA Los Angeles + BBC America TV Tea Party 2019 at The Beverly Hilton Hotel.

Best Subtle Sequins: Judith Heard

Photo: Sean Zanni/Patrick McMullan via Getty Image

At the 2019 Pamoja For Mamas Reception at Bryant Park Grill Rooftop.

Best Animal Kingdom-Inspired Outfits: Heidi Gardner and Melissa Villaseñor

Photo: Andrew Toth/Getty Images for Comedy Central

At the Comedy Central’s Emmy Party at Dream Hotel.

Best Sister Sandwich: Gigi Hadid, Rihanna, and Bella Hadid

Photo: Sansho Scott/BFA.com

At the Fenty Paris Fashion Week after party at 1 OAK.

Best Patchwork Moment: Margherita Missoni

Photo: David M. Benett/Dave Benett/Getty Images for Eco

At the Green Carpet Fashion Awards, Italia 2019, after party at Palazzo Marino.

Grooviest Leather Dress: Eva Padberg

Photo: Isa Foltin/Getty Images

At the Vaunet Summer Party.

Best “Gone Fishing” Look: Billy Fong; Edgiest Ballerina: Kristin Cole

Photo: Bruno Images

At the Miron Crosby x Prabal Gurung launch.

Most Romantic Maxi: Nicky Zimmermann

Photo: Bertrand Rindoff Petroff/Getty Images For Zimmermann

At the Zimmermann Paris Boutique Opening.
description: This week’s best party pics feature Tan France, Laverne Cox, and Natasha Lyonne. Who wore the best look?
